strings.Value: "You say we could be useful to each other?"
"Who are you?"
[Attack] "Your words will not save you, monster!"
"I have to go."
"What do you know of the war between the kobolds and mites?"
"No, I am not interested in this."
"Fine."
"An old traveler, you say?"
"If you're hungry, then hunt. I see no point in interfering with the natural order of things."
{n}The beast before you is unusually large, and its eyes, especially angry. Its menacing grin might almost be taken for a smirk.{/n}
"Greetings."
"Greetings, traveler. Before you draw your weapon, I wish to say I see no reason for feuding between us. We might even be of some use to each other."
"Only that my pack enjoys it."{n} The worg snorts and licks his lips.{/n} "Of course, I only eat fresh meat..."
"You may call me Grarrukh. I've lived here far longer than the rulers of those foolish tribes... I have seen much, and eaten many."
"Bring me someone delicious. Three or four bodies will be enough. And I, as a sign of gratitude, will tell you where an old traveler buried his chest."
{n}Grinning, the worg looks straight at you.{/n}"Deal! I'll await your return."
"Well, as you wish. But consider my offer... You may yet think of something."
"Truth be told, I should thank you â€” finally, a decent meal! It is a pleasure to deal with you. The chest is buried under a lonely tree to the west."
"Wait, why is this wolf talking? Is it magical or something?"

"I am no wolf, female. I am a worg. Surprising you could live to your age without learning the difference. Well, it's never too late to teach a lesson to an insolent two-legged morsel..." {n}The beast slowly licks its teeth.{/n}"
"Who are you calling a morsel, you pelt?" {n}Amiri glares at the beast, her hand on her sword.{/n}"
"A very old, lean and flavorless traveler." {n}The warg grins, almost smiling.{/n}
"Right! We're not going to start a chat with every stray mutt we come across!"
"Good. I love fresh meat!"
"How could you agree to such a monstrous deal?" {n}Tristian shakes his head slowly.{/n}
"This creature is filled with irredeemable evil. Sarenrae, guide my blade!"
"We cannot leave such dangerous animals to live in our future lands. Slay the beast!"
